snippet: The report, by researchers from China, was published with commentary from American health officials, who said the disease “raised many urgent questions.”
abstract: Report in The New England Journal of Medicine points to several troubling features of new strain of bird flu sweeping China, including severity of its symptoms and likelihood that humans have no resistance to it.
lead_paragraph: The report, by researchers from China, was published with commentary from American health officials, who said the disease “raised many urgent questions.”

headline.seo: Report Published on 3 Who Died From H7N9 Bird Flu
headline.main: Report on 3 in China Who Died From Bird Flu Points to Severity of Strain
headline.print_headline: Report on 3 in China Who Died From Bird Flu Points to Severity of Strain

keywords.value: Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
